plot: An unnamed, socially detached, paranoid young man receives a knock on his door. A mysterious package lay outside, containing a disc titled, 'Polybius'. And so begins his decent into madness...
title: Polybius
plot_es: An unnamed, socially detached, paranoid young man receives a knock on his door. A mysterious package lay outside, containing a disc titled, 'Polybius'. And so begins his decent into madness...
plot_en: An unnamed, socially detached, paranoid young man receives a knock on his door. A mysterious package lay outside, containing a disc titled, 'Polybius'. And so begins his decent into madness...
